text: Aur (unn kay liye) jinhon ney iss ghar mein (yani madina) aur eman mein inn say pehlay jagah bana li hai aur apni taraf hijrat ker kay aaney walon say mohabbat kertay hain aur mohajireen ko jo kuch dey diya jaye iss say woh apney dilon mein koi tangi nahi rakhtay bulkay khud apney upper enhen tarjeeh detay hain go khud ko kitni hi sakht haajat ho (baat yeh hai) kay jo bhi apney nafs kay bukhul say bachaya gaya wohi kaamyaab (aur baa murad) hai
